Uses of Package
main

Packages that use main
Package
Description
main
 
  • Classes in main used by main
    Class
    Description
    Athlete
    The Athlete class represents an athlete that can be purchased in the game.
    ByeWeekScreen
    GUI for the instance in which a user chooses for their team to take a bye week
    CannotPlay
    Custom exception class indicating that the game cannot be played, and therefore a new match cannot be initiated.
    ClubScreen
    GUI implementation of the "club" where a user can swap athlete positions, and use items on the athletes to improve their stats
    FinishScreen
    GUI implementation of the final results at completion of the game.
    GameEnvironment
    This class represents the game environment for managing a team, reserves, items, and game progress.
    IncorrectInput
    An exception class representing incorrect input.
    InitializeTeam
    GUI implementation of selecting a team for the Quadball tournament
    InitiateMatchScreen
    GUI implementation for picking an opposition team for the next match
    Interaction
    Represents the interaction between the user and the game environment.
    Item
    Represents an item that can be purchased.
    MainScreen
    GUI implementation for the home screen.
    Match
    Represents a match between the player's team and an opposition team.
    OppositionTeam
    Represents an opposition team in a match.
    Purchasable
    The Purchasable interface represents an item that can be purchased.
    PurchasableManager
    The PurchasableManager class is responsible for managing athletes and items that can be purchased.
    PurchaseScreen
    GUI implementation of the market to buy athletes and items
    ResultScreen
    GUI implementation for showing the match results to the user
    ScreenManager
    The manager class that interacts with all the screens in the GUI application
    SetUpScreen
    GUI implementation of the set up where the user creates a team name, selects season duration, and selects difficulty
    WelcomeScreen
    GUI Implementation of the welcome screen where the user starts a new tournament
